alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 6:22AM CST until January 29 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. For the Big Black/Homochitto...including West, Bentonia, Bovina, Rosetta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River Near Bentonia. * WHEN...From this morning to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, Agricultural land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 23.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Big Black River Bentonia 22.0 21.5 Wed 6 am CST 23.2 23.5 22.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening By 800 PM CST.
